_sText:
MG PAULS SMASH REBORN

MAP INFO

Map ported from CS:GO to CS:S... A smash level map with 5 random round modes and 3 random round endings. The aim of the map is to survive for 2 minutes by running around or camping on platforms that are constantly under attack from flying blocks that are being spawned..

Change Log

v2 Map ported from CS:GO to CS:S. 1 in 10 chance of playing creeper mode 1 in 8 chance of middle push tirgger being enabled 1 in 5 chance of everyon being respawned after 90 seconds (if server allows sm_respawn cmd to be fired) 1 of 3 random models spawn each round
